feature.label: Why3 Adapter Plugin Feature
feature.description: The plugin adds a reasoner and auto tactics based on external why3 prover manager tool. It makes available a wide range of SMT-LIB and TPTP compliant provers via the why3 umbrella tool. The plug-in can function eithe with a local installation of why3 and provers or connect remotely to a cloud service provide by Newcastle University hosting the proof environment.
